name: CalcRogue
description:
What is CalcRogue?

A work in progress Roguelike that is coded in TiBasic and runs on Ti-84/+ calculators (maybe the CEs and 83s too, but I don't have ones to test)

How do you play?
Once it's on the calculator, run "CROGUE" and enter a seed.

Use the arrows to move your character around. I will probably change the controls so they use the Numpad instead, enabling diagonal movement.

What do you do in the game?

Currently you just wander around. In general, going up and down a level works, but sometimes the exit will be unreachable in which case
